head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COBARRUBIA, SALTZMAN, JODI

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COBARRUBIA, SALTZMAN, JODI

block.p: COBARRUBIA - SALTZMAN - Jodi. May 8, 2000. Seattle, Washington. Died suddenly age 34. Beloved wife of Frank, loving daughter of Muriel and Ralph, sister of Lisa. Her love of life will live on in the hearts of those she touched. You will always be in our hearts. Contributions in her memory may be sent to The Churchill School, NY. Service on Monday, May 15, at 11 AM at The Riverside, 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
